SENT.plain: Williams-Beuren Syndrome (WBS) is associated with constitutional deletion of 7q11.23, which includes the elastin gene
Cytogenetic abnormalities of chromosome 7 are frequently described in several human malignancies
Here, we report Burkitt Leukemia in an 8-year-old boy with WBS
In this patient, constitutional deletion of chromosome 7q11.23 including BCL7B was confirmed
WBS may predispose patients to Burkitt Leukemia
